content: skill level intermediate gauge in single_crochet worked in front loops only using us h-8 5 mm hook 11 sts and 8 row = 3 /7 5 cm each completed motif measures 4 /10 cm from the website the shawl includes row of broomstick jiffy lace there are two steps in working broomstick lace first loops of stitches are extended and placed on a large knitting needle the broomstick next the loops are worked off the needle with single_crochet note from the designer this isn t your traditional broomstick lace project it is a special broomstick variation i developed specifically for this design >note from designer this pattern is no longer available on the caron website i have been given written permission to post the pdfs of my free caron patterns on ravelry
